pages.text: The advancements tab and JEI are important places to look for information on progression path and details respectively. For more resources, check out the links on the following page.

$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/project-rankine)CurseForge Page$() $(br)General information with more links.  $(br2)$(l:https://discord.gg/Aj2DKEa9yB)Discord$() $(br)Our Discord where we and other members are active in answering questions.   $(br2)$(l:https://github.com/CannoliCatfish/project-rankine/wiki)GitHub Wiki$() $(br)Technical documentation for config changes and datapacks.
